LanguageData.DesignatorDigTerrainDesc: Designate moatable terrain to be dug.
LanguageData.DesignatorFillTerrainDesc: Designate moatable terrain to be filled.
LanguageData.TerrainBeingDug: The surface is already marked for digging.
LanguageData.TerrainBeingFilled: The surface is already marked for filling.
LanguageData.AtDeepestLevel: Can't dig deeper, already at the lowest level.
LanguageData.AtHighestLevel: Can't fill more, already at highest level.
LanguageData.CantFillWater: There's too much water, consider using a pump.
